title: The Chocolate War
description: Jerry Renault is pondering the question on the poster in his locker: Do I dare disturb the universe?Refusing to sell chocolates in the annual Trinity School fund-raiser may not seem like a radical thing to do. But when Jerry challenges a secret school society called The Vigils, his defiant act turns into an all-out war. Now the only question is: Who will survive?
author: Robert Cormier
